items.Title: BMW M3 GTR GT,E46
items.info:
BMW “GTR GT” (M3 GTR, E46)
BMW M Motorsport built this 2001 M3 GTR for the American Le Mans Series (ALMS) — and it instantly became a GT-class monster. In 10 races it won 7 times, and Jörg Müller took the GT drivers’ title; BMW also won team + manufacturer championships. The same car later became a cult icon in Need for Speed: Most Wanted (2005) thanks to its silver-blue livery and V8 soundtrack.
Power: ~450 hp • Weight: 1,100 kg • Top speed: ~260 km/h

raceHistory: Jörg Müller won the GT drivers’ title
